info.title: Saved Views
info.description: The Saved Views API provides a central place to store view information so it can be retrieved or shared across applications.

patch.description:
---

Renames a tag.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:modify`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

401.description: This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.

error.message: Access denied due to invalid access_token. Make sure to provide a valid token for this API endpoint.

403.description: The user has insufficient permissions for the requested operation.

error.message: The user has insufficient permissions for the requested operation.
Requested tag is not available.
Cannot update tag.

429.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

error.message: More requests were received than the subscription rate-limit allows.

delete.description:
---

Deletes a tag, tags must be unassigned from every saved view before they can be deleted.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:modify`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

Requested tag is not available.

429.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

error.message: More requests were received than the subscription rate-limit allows.

get.description:
---

Retrieves all tags associated to a project or project/iModel combination.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:read`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

200.description: List of all available tags for the project and iModel.

401.description: This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.

error.message: Access denied due to invalid access_token. Make sure to provide a valid token for this API endpoint.
Requested tag is not available.

429.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

error.message: More requests were received than the subscription rate-limit allows.

delete.description:
---

Deletes a saved view, images assigned to that saved view will be deleted as well.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:modify`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

get.description:
---

Retrieves all saved view associated to a project, project/iModel combination or group, at least one parameter must be provided.

This operation supports pagination and will sort saved views by displayName.

As the view data can be quite large, this collection call will not contain the view data themselves. To retrieve the data, make a call to [Get saved view](../get-savedview)

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:read`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

200.description: List of all saved views associated to the query.

401.description: This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.

error.message: Access denied due to invalid access_token. Make sure to provide a valid token for this API endpoint.
Requested savedview is not available.
Cannot retrieve saved view.

429.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

error.message: More requests were received than the subscription rate-limit allows.

post.description:
---

Creates a saved view. The saved view must include one an only view: 3D, Sheet or Drawing. 
Additional custom information can be stored in the appData field.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:modify`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

401.description: This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.

error.message: Access denied due to invalid access_token. Make sure to provide a valid token for this API endpoint.

error.message: The user has insufficient permissions for the requested operation.
Requested project is not available.
Cannot create saved view.

429.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

error.message: More requests were received than the subscription rate-limit allows.

get.description:

Generates or retrieves an Url for the image or thumbnail associated to a saved view.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `savedviews:read`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

Requested image is not available.

retry-after.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

target.description: Optional target of the error message

shared.description: Flag for whether or not element is shared

yaw.description: Yaw (rotation of x towards y) of the orientation, in degrees

pitch.description: Pitch (rotation that raises x towards z) of the orientation, in degrees

roll.description: Roll (rotation of y towards z) of the orientation, in degrees

lens.description: Angle of the camera lens, in degrees

focusDist.description: Focal distance of the lens, in meters

eye.description: Location of the eye of the camera. (Array of numbers representing x, y and z)

enabled.description: List of Ids that should be enabled/visible.

disabled.description: List of Ids that should be disabled/hidden.

origin.description: The lower left back corner of the view frustum. (Array of numbers representing x, y and z)

extents.description: The extent of the view frustum. (Array of numbers representing x, y and z)

origin.description: Origin. (Array of numbers representing x and y)

delta.description: Delta. (Array of numbers representing x and y)

width.description: Width of the sheet, in meters

height.description: Height of the sheet, in meters

origin.description: Origin. (Array of numbers representing x and y)

delta.description: Delta. (Array of numbers representing x and y)

spatialView.description: The Id of the spatial view from which the SectionDrawing was generated.

displaySpatialView.description: If true, the spatial view should be displayed in the context of the drawing view.

drawingToSpatialTransform.description: Transform from drawing coordinates to spatial coordinates. If undefined, use identity transform. 3 X 4 transformation matrix containing 3 arrays of matrix rows consisting of 4 numbers each: [qx qy qz ax] where the fourth columnn in each row holds the translation.

modelExtents.description: The extents of the DrawingModel, used for determining the upper limits of the view's extents.

shared.description: Flag for whether or not Saved View is shared

tagIds.description: List of tag ids to apply to the saved view

legacyView.description: Legacy data, un-updatable, will soon be deprecated move to new service

shared.description: Flag for whether or not element is shared
Flag for whether or not element is shared
Flag for whether or not Saved View is shared

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: Optional array of more specific errors.

Error.description: Contains error information and an optional array of more specific errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

ErrorResponse.title: Error Response
ErrorResponse.description: Gives details for an error that occurred while handling the request. Note that clients MUST NOT assume that every failed request will produce an object of this schema, or that all of the properties in the response will be non-null, as the error may have prevented this response from being constructed.
